title: Bug 17758[Navigator] Navigator View. Problems with 'Go Into' action
description: The 'Go Into' action in the Navigator View is experiencing issues.
OB: The 'Go Into' action remains enabled even after opening a project (e.g., org.eclipse.lucene) and selecting a folder (e.g., 'bin') in the Navigator View.
EB: The 'Go Into' action should be disabled when a project is closed, and a message or indication, such as 'Project is closed,' should appear in the Navigator View. This would provide a clear visual feedback to the user regarding the project's status.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a project in the Navigator View.
2. Select a folder within the project, e.g., 'bin'.
3. Observe that the 'Go Into' action remains enabled, even though it should be disabled when the project is closed.
